about_the_game:
Mr Monkey & Touc is an N64 throwback 3D collectathon. You play as Mr Monkey and his trusty partner Touc as you travel through 6 unique worlds to save colourful characters, and fight various enemies and bosses along the way.

Mechanics

Being parkour experts, Mr Monkey and Touc will no doubt have "the skills to pay the bills" (developer note: there is no bill paying in the Jungle, as we all know; it's a tax haven). The players movement mechanics are as follows:

Mr Monkey
  • Running/Rolling
  • Double Jumping
  • Tree Climbing
  • Coconut Throwing
Touc
  • Gliding
  • Breaking Walls
  • Dropping Rocks

Worlds

Explore 6 unique worlds within the mysterious jungle Mr Monkey & Touc call home. The first world is a forest full of life, with a village on treetop, and a lot of dam beavers!

name: Mr Monkey & Touc

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.6 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 16 series
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: subject to change

short_description: An N64 throwback 3D collectathon. Play as Mr Monkey and his partner Touc to save their friends and the jungle they call home, and takedown the robots who threaten it. Explore 7 unique worlds, meet a colourful cast of characters and GO. BANANAS.
